_header: A barge to bearen fro deep grounds

NLS18721.Transcription:
A barge to beren fro depe groundesA targe to weren fro detly
                    woundesA falle to taken in þe fend& an halle to glaþen
                    in a frend
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 12.
